title: Unit 6: Around Town - Comprehensive Test
description: Test de vocabulario y expresiones conversacionales sobre lugares en la ciudad, direcciones y ubicaciones

questions.question: Where would you go to get cash?
Traduce: '¿Puedes decirme cómo llegar al museo?'
questions.answer: Can you tell me how to get to the museum?

questions.question: The bank is _____ the corner of Main and First Street.
When giving directions, 'Go straight ahead' means:
A drugstore is a place where you can buy medicine.
What do you say when you want to check if you heard correctly?
Is there a bank _____ here? Yes, there's one on Main Street.
Traduce: 'Gira a la derecha en la próxima esquina.'
questions.answer: Turn right at the next corner

questions.question: 'It's within walking distance' means the place is very far away.
Traduce: '¿Hay alguna tienda de conveniencia por aquí?'
questions.answer: Is there a convenience store around here?

questions.question: The parking garage is _____ front of the department store.
When offering help to someone who looks lost, you can say:
Traduce: 'Continúa hacia el este por esta calle.'
